code: import React from'react';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Subtotal=_ref=>{let{iteam}=_ref;const[price,setPrice]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{totalAmount();},[iteam]);const totalAmount=()=>{let price=0;iteam.map(item=>{price+=item.price.cost;});setPrice(price);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sub_item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Subtotal (",iteam.length," items):",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{style:{fontWeight:"700",color:"#111"},children:[" \u20B9",price,".00"]})]})});};export default Subtotal;
